鞙字的基本解释

鞙
xuān
〔鞙鞙〕古同“琄琄”，佩玉的样子。
大车上绑轭的皮条。

鞙
juān
有嚼口的马络头。
马尾。

鞙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuàn］
［《廣韻》胡畎切，上銑，匣。］
(1)悬挂。
(2)见“鞙鞙”。

鞙字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞙； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1388第13
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?戸畎切，音泫。【說文】大車縛軛靼也。　又【廣韻】䪎鞙，刀鞘也。　又【詩·小雅】鞙鞙佩璲。【傳】鞙鞙，玉貌。【釋文】瑚畎反，或作琄。【集韻】亦作䩙。　又【集韻】葵兗切，音蜎。大車縛軛靼。　又【廣韻】古懸切【集韻】圭懸切，?音涓。【廣韻】鞙，馬尾也。【集韻】馬勒。　又【集韻】火懸切，音鋗。義同。

考證：〔音泫。【說文】大車縛軛靻也。〕　謹照原文軛靻改軛靼。〔【集韻】音蜎。大車縛軛靻。〕　謹照原文軛靻改軛靼。
鞙字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鞙字的起名意思

形容佩玉的样子，同“琄琄”。

Basic explanation of words
Yang
xuān
[Yin Yin] Gu Tong "Yan Yan", looks like a jade.
The yoke of the thong on the cart.
Yang
juān
There is a chewy horse head.
Horsetail.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuàn］
["Guangyun" Hu Dian cut, milled, box. ]
(1) Hanging.
(2) See "Yangying".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞙; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1388 No. 13
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? 戸畎切，音泫. [Said the text] The cart is tied to the yoke.　[Guang Yun] Li Qian, the scabbard too.　[Poetry·Xiaoya] Pingyang Peihuang. [Biography] Yingyang, jade appearance. 【Explanation】Hu 畎 inverse, or Zuo 琄. [Jiyun] also used as a cock.　 [Ji Yun] Kwai Yan cut, sound. The cart is tied to the yoke.　[Guangyun] Ancient Xuanqi [Jiyun] Kyu Xuanqi,? The sound trickles. [Guang Yun] Feng, horse tail is also. [Ji Yun] Mahler.　[Jiyun] Huo Xuan cuts, the sound is 鋗. The same meaning. Textual research: [Yinxuan. [Said the text] The cart is tied to the yoke. 〕　I would like to change the yoke according to the original text. 〔【Jiyun】Sounds. The cart is tied to the yoke. 〕　I would like to change the yoke according to the original text.
